wikitext.*:
'''East Sindar''' were the [[Sindar]] who lived in the wide open lands east of [[Doriath]] beyond the [[Girdle of Melian]].<ref group="note">It is not stated exactly where the East Sindar lived, but the description and location of the lands they lived in coincides rather well with the description and location of [[Estolad]].</ref> They were not under the rule of [[Thingol]], and they practiced cattle-rearing and sheep-farming as well as growing grain and other crops - these they sold both to [[Doriath]] in the west and to the [[Dwarves]] of the [[Blue Mountains]] to the east.<ref>{{NM|P3v}}, p. 298</ref>
